text:
Hello <@UNWHHSWHJ>

I haven't tried this, it's just an idea.
Since HubSpot has a blog import tool for WordPress using an XML, the file should have a standard markup for the data.
You could create a custom view using a module like:
<https://www.drupal.org/project/views_data_export> to generate an XML file with the same markup. From here, you could use the current blog importer tool in HubSpot.
